description: Executes a low-down and dirty SSH command

free_form.description: the raw module takes a free form command to run. There is no parameter actually named 'free form'; see the examples!

executable.description: change the shell used to execute the command. Should be an absolute path to the executable. when using privilege escalation (C(become)), a default shell will be assigned if one is not provided as privilege escalation requires a shell.
